about_the_game:
Set in a post-apocalyptic world, as ex-military soldier Daku, discover the secrets of the sand and reveal how the world has gotten to this state. Uncover the many groups formed after the war, from the government corporation EcoSurge to the eco-terrorist group Rising Sands, and many more.

Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Rising Sands features grounded third person shooter gameplay mixed with fantasy. Heavily inspired by classic RPG titles alongside modern Shooters, the ever changing environments constantly being tampered by The Gemini's rising sand make for a unique experience for every player. The captivating story along with these elements lead to gripping boss fights that push Daku to his limits.



Rising Sands features complex characters in a world where no one truly knows who is right. See all sides of the story and discover what really happened after the war.

content_descriptors.notes: Rising Sands features heavy use of gun and fantasy violence.
